function.name: play_music
function.description: Plays a music track and records the playback operation.

music_name.description: The name of the music track to play, excluding the artist's name.

volume_level.description: The volume level for playback (0-100), ranging from 0 (silent) to 100 (loudest).

return.description: Status message indicating the result of the operation.

function.name: get_music_list_in_favorites
function.description: Returns the list of favorite tracks.
